Table.sql: SELECT case when g.maicd like 'J0%' or g.maicd like 'J20%' then '01' else case when g.maicd in ('J15','J15.1','J15.-1') then '02' else case when g.maicd in ('J15.2','J15.-2') then '03' else case when g.maicd in ('J15.3','J15.-3') then '04' else case when g.maicd like 'J85%' or g.maicd like 'J91%' or g.maicd like 'J90%' or g.maicd like 'J45%' or g.maicd like 'J86%' or g.maicd like 'J21%' or g.maicd like 'J46%' or g.maicd like 'J3%' then '05' else case when g.maicd like 'H6%' or g.maicd like 'H7%' or g.maicd like 'H8%' or g.maicd like 'H9%' then '06' else case when g.maicd like 'A03%' or g.maicd like 'A06%' then '07' else case when g.maicd like 'A09%' then '08' else '09' end end end end end end end end stt,a.MABN, a.HOTEN, substr(i.tuoivao,1,3)||decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),0,'TU',decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),1,'TH',decode(substr(i.tuoivao,4,1),2,'NG','GI'))) tuoi,nvl(h.quanhe,' ') quanhe,nvl(h.hoten,' ') hotenqh,nvl(a.SONHA,' ') sonha, nvl(a.THON,' ') thon, b.TENPXA, c.TENQUAN, d.TENTT,nvl(y.tenbv,' ') tenbv, to_char(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayvk,g.CHANDOAN, g.MAICD,' ' ttlucrk,' ' ngayrk,' ' SOLUUTRU,' ' nhom,' ' tennhom FROM btdbn a,benhandt g,btdpxa b,btdquan c,btdtt d,QUANHE h,lienhe i,noigioithieu x,dstt y WHERE a.MABN = g.MABN and a.MAPHUONGXA = b.MAPHUONGXA and a.MAQU = c.MAQU and a.MATT = d.MATT and g.MAQL = h.MAQL(+) and g.maql=i.maql and g.maql=x.maql(+) and x.mabv=y.mabv(+) and g.LOAIBA<>1
Table.cont: (g.maicd like 'J0%' or g.maicd like 'J20%' or g.maicd in ('J15','J15.1','J15.-1') or g.maicd in ('J15.2','J15.-2') or g.maicd in ('J15.3','J15.-3') or g.maicd like 'J85%' or g.maicd like 'J91%' or g.maicd like 'J90%' or g.maicd like 'J45%' or g.maicd like 'J86%' or g.maicd like 'J21%' or g.maicd like 'J46%' or g.maicd like 'J3%' or g.maicd like 'H6%' or g.maicd like 'H7%' or g.maicd like 'H8%' or g.maicd like 'H9%' or g.maicd like 'A03%' or g.maicd like 'A06%' or g.maicd like 'A09%')
Table.stt: case when g.maicd like 'J0%' or g.maicd like 'J20%' then '01' else case when g.maicd in ('J15','J15.1','J15.-1') then '02' else case when g.maicd in ('J15.2','J15.-2') then '03' else case when g.maicd in ('J15.3','J15.-3') then '04' else case when g.maicd like 'J85%' or g.maicd like 'J91%' or g.maicd like 'J90%' or g.maicd like 'J45%' or g.maicd like 'J86%' or g.maicd like 'J21%' or g.maicd like 'J46%' or g.maicd like 'J3%' then '05' else case when g.maicd like 'H6%' or g.maicd like 'H7%' or g.maicd like 'H8%' or g.maicd like 'H9%' then '06' else case when g.maicd like 'A03%' or g.maicd like 'A06%' then '07' else case when g.maicd like 'A09%' then '08' else '09' end end end end end end end end

Table.sql: SELECT case when g.maicd like 'J0%' or g.maicd like 'J20%' then '01' else case when g.maicd in ('J15','J15.1','J15.-1') then '02' else case when g.maicd in ('J15.2','J15.-2') then '03' else case when g.maicd in ('J15.3','J15.-3') then '04' else case when g.maicd like 'J85%' or g.maicd like 'J91%' or g.maicd like 'J90%' or g.maicd like 'J45%' or g.maicd like 'J86%' or g.maicd like 'J21%' or g.maicd like 'J46%' or g.maicd like 'J3%' then '05' else case when g.maicd like 'H6%' or g.maicd like 'H7%' or g.maicd like 'H8%' or g.maicd like 'H9%' then '06' else case when g.maicd like 'A03%' or g.maicd like 'A06%' then '07' else case when g.maicd like 'A09%' then '08' else '09' end end end end end end end end stt,a.MABN, a.HOTEN,substr(f.tuoivao,1,3)||decode(substr(f.tuoivao,4,1),0,'TU',decode(substr(f.tuoivao,4,1),1,'TH',decode(substr(f.tuoivao,4,1),2,'NG','GI'))) tuoi, nvl(h.quanhe,' ') quanhe, nvl(h.hoten,' ') hotenqh, nvl(a.SONHA,' ') sonha, nvl(a.THON,' ') thon, b.TENPXA, c.TENQUAN, d.TENTT,nvl(y.tenbv,' ') tenbv,to_char(f.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayvk, g.CHANDOAN, g.MAICD, e.TEN ttlucrk, to_char(g.ngay,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') ngayrk, ' ' SOLUUTRU,' ' nhom,' ' tennhom FROM btdbn a,NHAPKHOA f,btdpxa b,btdquan c,btdtt d,XUATKHOA g,ttxk e,BENHANDT i,QUANHE h,noigioithieu x,dstt y WHERE a.MABN = f.MABN and a.MAPHUONGXA = b.MAPHUONGXA and a.MAQU = c.MAQU and a.MATT = d.MATT and f.ID = g.ID and g.TTLUCRK = e.MA and f.MAQL = i.MAQL and i.MAQL = h.MAQL(+) and f.maql=x.maql(+) and x.mabv=y.mabv(+) and i.LOAIBA=1
